title: gringo: FTBFS: clone_allocator.hpp:34:27: error: invalid use of incomplete type 'struct Domain'

sentences.text: During a rebuild of all packages in sid, your package failed to build on amd64.

The full build log is available from:
A list of current common problems and possible solutions is available at  http://wiki.debian.org/qa.debian.org/FTBFS .
About the archive rebuild: The rebuild was done on about 50 AMD64 nodes of the Grid'5000 platform, using a clean chroot.
Internet was not accessible from the build systems.
On Tue Dec 20, 2011 03:49:14PM +0100, Lucas Nussbaum wrote:
> During a rebuild of all packages in sid, your package failed to build on > amd64.
> > /usr/include/boost/ptr_container/clone_allocator.hpp: In function 'T* boost::new_clone(const T&) [with T = Domain]':

> > /usr/include/boost/foreach.hpp:648:95:   instantiated from 'boost::foreach_detail_::auto_any<boost::foreach_detail_::simple_variant<T> > boost::foreach_detail_::contain(const T&, bool*) [with T = boost::ptr_unordered_map<std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int>, Domain>]'
> > /usr/include/boost/ptr_container/clone_allocator.hpp:34:27: error: invalid use of incomplete type 'struct Domain'
> The full build log is available from:
thanks for the report, it could be that this is related to the change from boost 1.46 to 1.48.
> A list of current common problems and possible solutions is available at  > http://wiki.debian.org/qa.debian.org/FTBFS .
> About the archive rebuild: The rebuild was done on about 50 AMD64 nodes > of the Grid'5000 platform, using a clean chroot.
Internet was not > accessible from the build systems.
TU Wien - Vienna University of Technology
tkren AT kr DOT tuwien DOT ac DOT at
We believe that the bug you reported is fixed in the latest version of gringo, which is due to be installed in the Debian FTP archive:
A summary of the changes between this version and the previous one is attached.
Thank you for reporting the bug, which will now be closed.
If you have further comments please address them to 652787@bugs.debian.org, and the maintainer will reopen the bug report if appropriate.
Thomas Krennwallner <tkren@kr.tuwien.ac.at> (supplier of updated gringo package)
(This message was generated automatically at their request;
if you believe that there is a problem with it please contact the archive administrators by mailing ftpmaster@debian.org)
gringo     - grounding tools for (disjunctive) logic programs Closes: 652787
* debian/copyright: Fix comma-separated-files-in-dep5-copyright,      obsolete-field-in-dep5-copyright and unversioned-copyright-format-uri
* Bug fix: "FTBFS: clone_allocator.hpp:34:27: error: invalid use of      incomplete type <struct Domain>", thanks to Lucas Nussbaum
* debian/control: Build-Depends on re2c to recreate parser.cpp from      parser.r2c, add boost version libboost-*N.MM-dev.
* debian/rules: Add override_dh_auto_configure and remove parser.cpp and      converter.cpp to force recreation of re2c lexer files.
